sql.where: 1=1 AND recharge.recharge_id = #{rechargeId} AND recharge.recharge_no = #{rechargeNo} AND recharge.user_id = #{userId} AND recharge.recharge_user_type = #{rechargeUser_type} AND recharge.recharge_amount = #{rechargeAmount} AND recharge.recharge_charge = #{rechargeCharge} AND recharge.recharge_actual_amount = #{rechargeActual_amount} AND recharge.recharge_bank_code = #{rechargeBank_code} AND recharge.recharge_bank_account = #{rechargeBank_account} AND recharge.recharge_bank_account_owner_name = #{rechargeBank_account_owner_name} AND recharge.recharge_bank_telephone = #{rechargeBank_telephone} AND recharge.recharge_card_type = #{rechargeCard_type} AND recharge.recharge_card_attribute = #{rechargeCard_attribute} AND recharge.recharge_bank_province = #{rechargeBank_province} AND recharge.recharge_bank_city = #{rechargeBank_city} AND recharge.recharge_bank_branch = #{rechargeBank_branch} AND recharge.recharge_ip = #{rechargeIp} AND recharge.recharge_remark = #{rechargeRemark} AND recharge.recharge_ticket = #{rechargeTicket} AND recharge.recharge_status = #{rechargeStatus} AND recharge.recharge_createtime = #{rechargeCreatetime} AND recharge.recharge_modifytime = #{rechargeModifytime} AND recharge.v2_mirror_sn = #{v2Mirror_sn}

1=1 AND recharge_id = #{rechargeId} AND recharge_no = #{rechargeNo} AND user_id = #{userId} AND recharge_user_type = #{rechargeUser_type} AND recharge_amount = #{rechargeAmount} AND recharge_charge = #{rechargeCharge} AND recharge_actual_amount = #{rechargeActual_amount} AND recharge_bank_code = #{rechargeBank_code} AND recharge_bank_account = #{rechargeBank_account} AND recharge_bank_account_owner_name = #{rechargeBank_account_owner_name} AND recharge_bank_telephone = #{rechargeBank_telephone} AND recharge_card_type = #{rechargeCard_type} AND recharge_card_attribute = #{rechargeCard_attribute} AND recharge_bank_province = #{rechargeBank_province} AND recharge_bank_city = #{rechargeBank_city} AND recharge_bank_branch = #{rechargeBank_branch} AND recharge_ip = #{rechargeIp} AND recharge_remark = #{rechargeRemark} AND recharge_ticket = #{rechargeTicket} AND recharge_status = #{rechargeStatus} AND recharge_createtime = #{rechargeCreatetime} AND recharge_modifytime = #{rechargeModifytime} AND v2_mirror_sn = #{v2Mirror_sn}

mapper.select: SELECT count(1) AS count FROM dr_recharge AS recharge

SELECT recharge.recharge_id as rechargeId, recharge.recharge_no as rechargeNo, recharge.user_id as userId, recharge.recharge_user_type as rechargeUser_type, recharge.recharge_amount as rechargeAmount, recharge.recharge_charge as rechargeCharge, recharge.recharge_actual_amount as rechargeActual_amount, recharge.recharge_bank_code as rechargeBank_code, recharge.recharge_bank_account as rechargeBank_account, recharge.recharge_bank_account_owner_name as rechargeBank_account_owner_name, recharge.recharge_bank_telephone as rechargeBank_telephone, recharge.recharge_card_type as rechargeCard_type, recharge.recharge_card_attribute as rechargeCard_attribute, recharge.recharge_bank_province as rechargeBank_province, recharge.recharge_bank_city as rechargeBank_city, recharge.recharge_bank_branch as rechargeBank_branch, recharge.recharge_ip as rechargeIp, recharge.recharge_remark as rechargeRemark, recharge.recharge_ticket as rechargeTicket, recharge.recharge_status as rechargeStatus, recharge.recharge_createtime as rechargeCreatetime, recharge.recharge_modifytime as rechargeModifytime, recharge.v2_mirror_sn as v2Mirror_sn FROM dr_recharge AS recharge WHERE recharge_id = #{rechargeId}

SELECT recharge.recharge_id as rechargeId, recharge.recharge_no as rechargeNo, recharge.user_id as userId, recharge.recharge_user_type as rechargeUser_type, recharge.recharge_amount as rechargeAmount, recharge.recharge_charge as rechargeCharge, recharge.recharge_actual_amount as rechargeActual_amount, recharge.recharge_bank_code as rechargeBank_code, recharge.recharge_bank_account as rechargeBank_account, recharge.recharge_bank_account_owner_name as rechargeBank_account_owner_name, recharge.recharge_bank_telephone as rechargeBank_telephone, recharge.recharge_card_type as rechargeCard_type, recharge.recharge_card_attribute as rechargeCard_attribute, recharge.recharge_bank_province as rechargeBank_province, recharge.recharge_bank_city as rechargeBank_city, recharge.recharge_bank_branch as rechargeBank_branch, recharge.recharge_ip as rechargeIp, recharge.recharge_remark as rechargeRemark, recharge.recharge_ticket as rechargeTicket, recharge.recharge_status as rechargeStatus, recharge.recharge_createtime as rechargeCreatetime, recharge.recharge_modifytime as rechargeModifytime, recharge.v2_mirror_sn as v2Mirror_sn FROM dr_recharge AS recharge
${orderby}
